ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Neverland: Age of Darkness
ComicInfo.Summary:
When everything is on the line, will Nathan Cross and HiboCorp be able to save Neverland from falling under the threat of the Dark Horde? The Dark Queen is bent on getting what she wants, and the only thing standing in her way is Cross.
Age of Darkness Tie-in
